sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Lumentum Holdings Inc (Symbol: LITE), where a total of 9,379 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 937,900 underlying shares.
That amounts to about 55.2% of LITE's average daily trading volume over the past month of 1.7 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $60 strike call option expiring August 17, 2018 , with 1,927 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 192,700 underlying shares of LITE.

Below is a chart showing LITE's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $60 strike highlighted in orange:

Papa John's International, Inc. (Symbol: PZZA) saw options trading volume of 14,623 contracts, representing approximately 1.5 million underlying shares or approximately 54.3% of PZZA's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 2.7 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $40 strike put option expiring August 17, 2018 , with 1,340 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 134,000 underlying shares of PZZA.

Below is a chart showing PZZA's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $40 strike highlighted in orange:

And Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) saw options trading volume of 23,956 contracts, representing approximately 2.4 million underlying shares or approximately 54.1% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 4.4 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $139 strike put option expiring August 10, 2018 , with 1,276 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 127,600 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $139 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for LITE options , PZZA options , or CRM options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
